text:
Hey Sachan ðŸ‘‹...kaisi hai...Hm phli bar kaise mile the ye toh yad nhi aarhi ðŸ˜„...but I guess neighbor se hi I get to know you more. Us k room change me v me jb v bore ho jati hu tere pas hi jati thi. Help toh bahot ki h mere ko..I hope meri wjh se irritate kv na hui ho...Tu hmesha jb v 3rd year pizza order ya canteen jati thi mere ko bulati thi and I can't say no to food uski weight loss aj tak me nhi kr pa rhi huðŸ˜”...
Future me v kv bore lge toh me "Hi sachan" mgs jarur krungi...ignore mat karna..
author: Lopamudra  Singh

text:
Hy Sachan ðŸ‘‹....kaisi h...phle hm kaise mile the the toh yad nhi h...but as a neighbor bahot acha experience rha...mujhe jb v even last year tak jb v bore lg jati thi me tere room pe hi chali jati thi...Thnx jarurat k time pe help krne k liye and even late night me v HC mere sath jane k liye...Tu hmesha phle jb v canteen jana ho ya pizza order krni ho mere ko puchti thi and at that time I was too obsessed with food...us ki weight loss aj tk me kr rhi hu...
Future me kv fir bore ho jau to text krungi and ignore mat kariyo..
Take care Sachan...
author: Lopamudra  Singh

text: Hey Ex-Roomie... 1st year me yoga, Eng class me hum mile the...wahan se roomie k ending tak ka safar tak mere liye toh bahot amazing safar tere sath rha h.  Thanks mere roomie ban ne k liye and Sorry becz of my mom's call. I know mere mummy kv kv bahot rat ko nhi toh subhah 6bje aise time pe call kr k bahot disturb kiye hai. Acha lga tere jaise cool, calm, sweet friend se mil k...
author: Lopamudra  Singh

text:
Hy neighbor....Firstly I want to say sorry for misunderstood you....bahot time se ye bolna chahti thi...it's true that hmra 1st meeting as a roomie itna acha nhi rha mere liye since us time pe closed friend k alwa mujhe bakiyon se bat krne me v bahot uncomfortable lg jati thi. But after room change I tried to talked to you...Luckily us k bad wle year me v hm neighbors rahe toh kuch v room ka prblm ho ya course ka prblm me hmesha tere pas jati thi..
Wese toh hmesha tu cheerful and happy rhti h isliye mil k acha lga...Take care
author: Lopamudra  Singh

text:
First I want to say I miss you since it's been a long time I've seen you, visit your room, talk to you about useless stuffs, go to shop, garden, canteen, outside campus together.
I hope we would be in touch together even after this graduation. You have been one of my close friend since 1st year and I'm glad that I made a friend like you.I'm happy that you transform yourself with a better version of yours after 2nd year Udgosh, I wish I could have done the same. Honestly speaking I feel a bit jealous at that time that I could not able to spent more time with you and I guess I've told you this before also. One more thing that really found irritate when we go to any shop is that you are very very very particular about the thing you buy. That's good in a way, but still it's a bit annoying. But your taste and choice in any thing like food, sweets, gifts, decor etc. all are too good. That's why I ask you first before buying anything. There are a lot of things where you struggled and came with improvement. There are very few people around whom I feel comfortable in campus and you know you are first one of them. There are a lots of flashback are coming to my mind right now, I don't know how to put those things in words. I just hope we could again have fun as before in campus. I hope 17th March 2020 will not be the last time of our togetherness. Hope to see you soon. Stay safe...Take care
author: Lopamudra  Singh

text: You always decorate your rooms with stuffs. These all are might be filled with dust.  Your plant and Teddy might be missing you
author: Lopamudra  Singh
